entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:31 p.m. CST Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this morning. 30 percent chance of showers this morning and early this afternoon. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 13. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low zero.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming east 50 gusting to 70 near noon. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Monday 17 April 2023
